localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Click2Contact helps visitors connect with sellers with a single tap connecting with customer where they connect. [Giveaway ğŸ‰] Comment how it can help your bussiness & get a 50% off just comment and send screenshot to sanskar@click2contact.app.
nodes.title: Click2Contact - Connecting visitors to businesses with a single tap
nodes.author: Sanskar Tiwari

nodes.excerpt: https://productlessons.xyz/ covers real examples and stories of career strategy, interview prep, analytics & more. Level up in 5 minutes a week. Join 5000+ happy readers for free!
nodes.title: Product Lessons - Actionable lessons to accelerate your career
nodes.author: Linda Zhang

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.
nodes.title: Invoid - Enabling KYC automation & identity verification in India
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Gladys Assistant is an open-source home automation software. It's easy to install on a Raspberry Pi, a NAS, or any machine running Linux.
nodes.title: Gladys Assistant v4 - A privacy-first, open-source home assistant
nodes.author: Pierre-Gilles

nodes.excerpt: One-of-a-kind portrait, landscape and abstract artworks created by Artificial Intelligence. Each artwork is minted as a non-fungible token (NFT) on Ethereum's own blockchain.
nodes.title: AImade.art 2.0 - Crypto art created by Artificial Intelligence
nodes.author: Arturo Calvo

nodes.excerpt: CoinGecko provides a fundamental analysis of the crypto market. In addition to tracking price, volume and market capitalization, CoinGecko tracks community growth, open-source code development, major events and on-chain metrics.
nodes.title: CoinGecko - 360-degree overview of the crypto market
nodes.author: Mahesh Shrestha

nodes.excerpt: TheProdcast is a technology podcast featuring seasoned product professionals, CEOs, Founders, and VCs. While our Season 1 focused on the stars behind stellar products that people love, Season 2 is all about impactful stories of promising women techologists.
nodes.title: TheProdcast - A podcast featuring impactful technology & product stories
nodes.author: Aishwarya Ashok

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your teamâ€™s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
nodes.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
nodes.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.
nodes.title: FlashDrive.io - noOps app platform for your apps
nodes.author: Alexandre Gonzales

nodes.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.
nodes.title: Homeroom - Personalized short-form learning for moving up in tech
nodes.author: Erik Spangenberg

nodes.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
nodes.title: Candid Resumes - Unbiased resume screening on autopilot
nodes.author: Ted Chiang

nodes.excerpt: Sharing in Clubhouse should be fast, easy, and convenient. Thatâ€™s where we come in. Pick a hashtag. Share it in your room. Drop a link. Drop a question. Dropit.
nodes.title: Dropit for Clubhouse - Sharing in Clubhouse made easy
nodes.author: Paul Shapiro

nodes.excerpt: Developers interested in creating applications and experiences for augmented reality, should check out the Mutrics ARiC open source augmented reality glasses, specifically created for the development process.
nodes.title: Mutrics ARiC - Open source all in one AR glasses for developers
nodes.author: Tanjum ğŸ”¥

nodes.excerpt: Hypernotes is a knowledge management app with bi-directional linking, outlining, and super-powered collaboration features.
nodes.title: Hypernotes - Create, share, and understand knowledge in a new way
nodes.author: Martin Welker

nodes.excerpt: Meet Red: the only full-featured, professional Redis client written from the ground-up for the Mac! Red provides a powerful yet wonderfully simple interface to interact with Redis.
nodes.title: Red - A powerful and beautiful Redis client for Mac
nodes.author: Stephen C. Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: Get a living snapshot of all your analytics. Just copy and paste a single line of code to your Website or App and, within minutes, all your events will be monitored and automatically added to your tracking plan.
nodes.title: Trackingplan - Monitor your analytics without the hassle
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Better collaboration for product teams in multiple time zones. Exchange video, voice, and screen recordings with your team at the tap of a button.
nodes.title: PingPong - Video messaging for remote teams
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Alt lets you treat your sports card collection as an investment portfolio. You can buy and sell pre-authenticated cards on our exchange and track the current market value for all your assets with our integrated portfolio management view.
nodes.title: Alt - Invest in sports cards just like stocks
nodes.author: Alexis Ohanian

nodes.excerpt: OtO is the first outdoor smart home device that:â€‹ â€‹ - you can set to water EXACTLY where you wantâ€‹ - applies environmentally-friendly fertilizers & pest controlâ€‹ - saves you time, water, and moneyâ€‹ Plus, itâ€™s solar powered! ğŸŒâ€‹
nodes.title: OtO Lawn - A smart sprinkler that makes sustainable lawncare effortless
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.
nodes.title: Serverless Invoices - Free, serverless invoice generator - open sourced
nodes.author: Marek

nodes.excerpt: We have developed a simple web app that lets you find apps on Google Play Store that have high download numbers (100,000+) but poor rating. This is a great business opportunity for anyone who can build a better app and monetize it by providing a paid version
nodes.title: 1000 Business Ideas - 1000 validated app ideas
nodes.author: Sagar Patil

nodes.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
nodes.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

nodes.excerpt: Nacapi creates a well documented API from any kind of JSON: - Paste your JSON file on the console - Create your unique API - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE http methods are supported - Perform operations: random, filtering, limit, sorting (and more coming soon)
nodes.title: Nacapi - Turn your JSON into a restful API
nodes.author: Nicolas Dessaigne

nodes.excerpt: Ready-to-use templates to prepare each email faster. Inform your subscribers about something very cool in a modern way. Don't waste time changing a single email design. Focus on the content.
nodes.title: Letterbox - Clean HTML email templates for creating stylish newsletters
